data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Sporting.
Joao Palhinha (Sporting) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Santa Clara have a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Sporting's Nuno Santos gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Santa Clara at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Sporting have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
Sporting push upfield but Manuel Mota quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick for Santa Clara in the half of Sporting.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Ball safe as Sporting is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 7, Joao Afonso is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Joao Afonso returns to the field for Santa Clara after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 11, Sporting to take a throw-in in Santa Clara territory.
Santa Clara have a dangerous throw-in.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 12, Manuel Mota signals a Sporting throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
Pedro Goncalves for Sporting drives towards goal at Estadio de Sao Miguel. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sporting's half?
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Sporting at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Manuel Mota awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in Sporting.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ponta Delgada.
Free kick Sporting.
In the minute 18, Can Sporting capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Santa Clara's Cristian Gonzalez has been booked in Ponta Delgada.
Ball goes out of play for a Santa Clara goal kick.
In the minute 20, Goal! Pedro Goncalves gives Sporting a 0-1 lead.
Jovane Cabral instrumental with a fine assist.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
In the minute 24, Sporting's Nuno Santos breaks free at Estadio de Sao Miguel. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Santa Clara have a goal kick.
Manuel Mota signals a throw-in for Sporting, close to Santa Clara's area.
In the minute 26, It's a goal kick for the away team in Ponta Delgada.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Sporting.
In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 29, Manuel Mota awards the home team a throw-in.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Sporting.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 35, Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
In the minute 40, Sporting have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
Can Sporting capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santa Clara's half?
Corner awarded to Sporting.
In the minute 42, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Thiago Santana gets an equalizer for Santa Clara. The score is now 1-1.
Great play from Lincoln to set up the goal.
In the minute 44, Can Sporting get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santa Clara's half?
Sporting are pushing forward but Jovane Cabral's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Santa Clara goal kick.
In the minute 45, Free kick Sporting.
Manuel Mota will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Pierre Sagna (Santa Clara) gets a yellow card.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Throw-in for Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Sporting in the half of Santa Clara.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 51, Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
Manuel Mota signals a Sporting throw-in in Santa Clara's half.
Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Santa Clara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Ponta Delgada Sporting attack through Joao Palhinha. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 56, Manuel Mota awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
The away team replace Jovane Cabral with Andraz Sporar.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Sporting at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
At Estadio de Sao Miguel, Santa Clara are penalized for being offside.
The away team have replaced Luis Neto with Tiago Tomas. This is the second substitution made today by Ruben Amorim.
Pedro Porro for Sporting gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 58, Goal kick for Santa Clara at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Santa Clara advance rapidly upfield but Manuel Mota blows for offside.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Santa Clara.
In the minute 61, Free kick Santa Clara.
Throw-in Santa Clara.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Sporting.
Important block from the Santa Clara defence as Nuno Santos fires in a strike for Sporting.
In the minute 63, Anderson Carvalho is booked for the home team.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
In the minute 64, Goal kick for Santa Clara at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Sporting to take a throw-in in Santa Clara territory.
In the minute 66, Manuel Mota awards the away team a throw-in.
Sporting make their third substitution with Joao Mario replacing Matheus Nunes.
Sporting's Andraz Sporar gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ponta Delgada.
Sportingâ€™s Andraz Sporar is on his feet again at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Sporting needs to be cautious. Santa Clara have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 68, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Andraz Sporar.
In the minute 69, Santa Clara have a goal kick.
Osama Rashid is replacing Costinha for the home team.
Daniel Ramos is making the team's second substitution at Estadio de Sao Miguel with Nene replacing Anderson Carvalho.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Sporting.
Santa Clara have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, In Ponta Delgada, Andraz Sporar (Sporting) misses the target with a header.
Manuel Mota awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
Rafael Ramos is replacing Pierre Sagna for Santa Clara at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 76, Ball goes out of play for a Santa Clara goal kick.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Manuel Mota.
In the minute 80, Ball goes out of play for a Santa Clara goal kick.
Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Pedro Goncalves.
Zouhair Feddal with an assist there.
In the minute 83, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Sporting is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Manuel Mota signals a Santa Clara throw-in in Sporting's half.
In the minute 85, Manuel Mota awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Santa Clara.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 87, In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jean Patrick Lima dos Reis is on a sub for Carlos Carvalho for Santa Clara.
Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Shahriar Moghanloo is replacing Cristian Gonzalez for the home team.
In the minute 88, Ruben Amorim (Sporting) is making a fourth substitution, with Goncalo Inacio replacing Nuno Santos.
Throw-in for Santa Clara close to the penalty box.
In the minute 89, In Ponta Delgada Santa Clara attack through Jean Patrick Lima dos Reis. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ponta Delgada.
Free kick for Sporting in the half of Santa Clara.
Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Santa Clara.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Ponta Delgada.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Ponta Delgada, Santa Clara push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Manuel Mota signals a free kick to Sporting.
Throw-in high up the field for Santa Clara in Ponta Delgada.
Throw-in for Sporting at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Full-time! The final score is 1-2.
Sebastian Coates (Sporting) has received a first yellow card.
